TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː z k ɔː s t ə æ s k h ɜː t ə t eɪ k ð ɪ z t ɪ ŋ z w ɪ ð h ɜː f ɹ ʌ m ð ə t oːɹ s ɪ k s p uː n z ʌ v f ɹ ɛ ʃ n oʊ p ɪ z f aɪ ð θ ɪ k s l æ p z ʌ v b l uː tʃ ɪ z æ n d m eɪ b i ɐ z n ɛ k f ɔːɹ h ɚ b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ b æ b w iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ z m ɔː l p l æ s t ɪ k s n eɪ k æ n d ɐ b ɪ ɡ t oːɹ f ɹ ɑː k f ɔːɹ ð ə k ɪ d z ʃ iː k æ n s k uː p ð ɪ z t ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t ʊ f ɹ iː ɹ ɛ d b ɛ k s æ n w iː w ɪ l ɡ oʊ m ɪ d h ɚ w ɛ n z d eɪ æ t ð ə t ɹ eɪ n s t ʃ ə n

SNACK INCONTEXT: znɛk
SNACK NOCONTEXT: nɛk
BAGS INCONTEXT: bɛks
